about_the_game:
Take to the skies in this thrilling 2D drone racing game that combines fast-paced action, challenging physics, and competitive gameplay. Navigate tight turns, avoid obstacles, and master the art of precision flying across dynamic tracks inspired by the excitement of Trackmania.

Features:

  • Physics-Driven Gameplay: Feel the thrill of floaty quadcopter-like controls as you perfect your racing skills.

  • Challenging Tracks: Conquer unique courses with speed boosts, control-disrupting gates, and fiery traps.

  • Global Leaderboards: Compete with players across Steam for the top spot.

  • Creative Modes: Build and share your own tracks using our campaign editor and then challenge friends or the community through the Steam workshop.

  • Unique Music: We are working to make each campaign have it's own feel and have really enjoyed making our own music for the various levels.  

Whether you're a casual gamer or a competitive racer,  drone dash delivers endless fun, skillful challenges, and general sillyness.

Take to the skies in this thrilling 2D drone racing game that combines fast-paced action, challenging physics, and competitive gameplay. Navigate tight turns, avoid obstacles, and master the art of precision flying across dynamic tracks inspired by the excitement of Trackmania.

Features:

  • Challenging Tracks: Conquer unique courses with speed boosts, control-disrupting gates, and fiery traps.

  • Global Leaderboards: Compete with players across Steam for the top spot.

  • Creative Modes: Build and share your own tracks using our campaign editor and then challenge friends or the community through the Steam workshop.

  • Unique Music: We are working to make each campaign have it's own feel and have really enjoyed making our own music for the various levels.  

Whether you're a casual gamer or a competitive racer,  drone dash delivers endless fun, skillful challenges, and general sillyness.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: Dual-core (2.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (Intel UHD 620 or better)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: Dual-core (2.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (Intel UHD 620 or better)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 11
  • Processor: Apple and Intel Silicon
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 11
  • Processor: Apple and Intel Silicon
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

name: Drone Dash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual-core (2.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (Intel UHD 620 or better)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual-core (2.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (Intel UHD 620 or better)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Race, boost, and soar through physics-driven tracks in this fast-paced 2D drone racing game. Master precision flying, compete on global leaderboards, and push your skills to the limit!
